column2: Title: Physics Teacher Location: singarayakonda Position Type:  Full-time/Part-time About Us:  [Insert School/Organization Name] is a dynamic educational institution committed to providing high-quality education and fostering intellectual curiosity among students. We aim to cultivate a stimulating learning environment that promotes academic excellence and personal growth. Job Description:  We are seeking a passionate and dedicated Physics Teacher to join our faculty. The successful candidate will be responsible for delivering comprehensive physics instruction to students, fostering a deep understanding of fundamental principles, and cultivating an appreciation for the wonders of the physical world. The Physics Teacher will develop engaging lesson plans, conduct laboratory experiments, and utilize innovative teaching methodologies to enhance student learning and comprehension. Responsibilities: Develop and implement curriculum plans in alignment with educational standards and objectives. Teach physics concepts through engaging lectures, demonstrations, and multimedia presentations. Facilitate laboratory sessions to reinforce theoretical learning and promote hands-on experimentation. Assess student progress through a variety of methods, including quizzes, tests, projects, and presentations. Provide constructive feedback to students to support their academic growth and development. Foster a positive and inclusive classroom environment conducive to learning and intellectual exploration. Collaborate with colleagues to coordinate interdisciplinary projects and activities. Participate in professional development opportunities to enhance teaching skills and stay abreast of best practices in physics education. Communicate effectively with students, parents, and colleagues to address concerns and promote student success. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Physics, Education, or a related field (Master's degree preferred). Teaching certification/license in Physics or Secondary Education (or eligibility for certification). Proven experience teaching physics at the secondary or post-secondary level. Deep knowledge of physics principles and concepts, with the ability to convey complex ideas in a clear and accessible manner. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage and motivate students from diverse backgrounds. Proficiency in utilizing educational technology tools and resources to enhance instruction. Commitment to ongoing professional development and lifelong learning. Benefits: Competitive salary commensurate with experience Health insurance and retirement benefits Professional development opportunities Collaborative and supportive work environment Opportunities for growth and advancement within the organization Role & responsibilities: Outline the day-to-day responsibilities for this role. Preferred candidate profile: Specify required role expertise, previous job experience, or relevant certifications. Perks and benefits: Mention available facilities and benefits the company is offering with this job.

column2: Job Description Teacher Associate (PCMB) Tamil Medium  Position Summary: The Program Associate will lead end-to-end operations for one Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya school. Her/his role includes teaching, inspiring, training and motivating students towards achieving their learning goals. Key responsibilities include, but are not limited to:  Classroom Teaching and Management  Conduct remote classes on Zoom  Prepare for classroom sessions with presentation slides in advance and teach students for ~30 hours a week  Explain concepts in a creative and engaging way using real life examples  Monitor students progress, their classwork and homework to ensure that they are on track to achieving their learning goals  Encourage self-discipline and punctuality in the Avanti Classroom  Mentoring, Career Guidance and Academic Support  Build strong relationships with students through one-on-one interaction sessions, help students overcome their academic and personal issues  Regularly work with students to break down their academic workload into small achievable goals and track their progress on these goals  Debrief with students regularly on their test scores and classroom performance (both CBSE board and Avanti) and suggest ideas for improvement  Assist students in building their career trajectory based on their interests  Parent Engagement  Discuss the students performance with their parents in person or over phone at least once a month  Conduct Parent Teacher Meetings (PTMs) in schools at least once every 3 months and share aggregate and individual reports with parents  Data Analysis  Consistently collect and upload feedback about classroom and test performance on Avantis online learning management system  Quarterly analyze students??performance and track high/low performers, while providing targeted support to the high/low performers  Generate insights on reasons for poor student performance and devise solutions to address those problems  Special Projects  Create a healthy learning culture by working on initiatives like (but not limited to) arranging expert guest sessions, organizing field trips/excursions, planning scientific debates in the classroom, etc. Requirements:  Education:  B.Sc./M.Sc./ B.E./B.Tech  Skills:  Subject matter knowledge in any one subject (Physics/Chemistry/Maths/Biology) for Class XI and XII  Interpersonal skills, relationship building, and stakeholder management skills  Effective communication skills, both spoken and written  A quiet room to conduct classes  Basic proficiency in using computer software and a laptop with uninterrupted internet connection and a minimum upload speed of 2 MBPS  Previous experience in teaching is a plus  Personality traits:  Deeply care about education and have empathy towards students from low-income backgrounds and their teachers and parents  Ability to connect with, inspire and motivate students  Passion for teaching and working in the Education Sector Experience/exposure that the candidate will gain  An experience of engaging with and building career trajectories for students from low income families in rural India.  An opportunity to be mentored by the Avanti team, hailing from premier educational (e.g. IITs, NITs, Top 100 Engineering Colleges, Miranda House, Harvard, Stanford, etc.) and professional backgrounds (Teach For India, Gandhi Fellowship, BCG, EY, etc.) Skills that the candidate will gain  Multifaceted stakeholder and interpersonal skills, including communication with government school principals, teachers, parents, and Avanti team members  Project management skills, while managing several verticals simultaneously Salary Details: Commensurate with experience Location: Tamil Nadu

column2: BBIT Public School is looking for Physics PGT to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As a Physics Post Graduate Teacher (PGT), you will play a crucial role in educating and inspiring students in the field of physics      This role involves designing and delivering effective lessons, conducting experiments, and fostering a positive learning environment      Physics PGTs contribute to the academic and personal development of students, preparing them for further education and future careers in the sciences        Key Responsibilities:        Curriculum Development:Design and develop a comprehensive and engaging physics curriculum for the designated grade level(s)      Integrate relevant experiments, demonstrations, and real-world applications into lesson plans      Classroom Instruction:Deliver effective and interactive physics lessons that cater to diverse learning styles      Foster critical thinking, problem-solving skills, and a passion for physics among students      Laboratory Management:Conduct laboratory sessions, experiments, and demonstrations to provide practical insights into physics concepts      Ensure the safety and proper usage of laboratory equipment      Student Assessment:Develop and administer assessments, quizzes, and exams to evaluate students' understanding of physics concepts      Provide constructive feedback to students to support their academic progress      Individualized Instruction:Provide additional support and guidance to students who may require individualized instruction      Encourage students to explore advanced topics and pursue independent research      Parent-Teacher Communication:Maintain open and effective communication with parents regarding students' academic performance and overall development      Attend parent-teacher conferences to discuss individual student progress      Professional Development:Stay updated on advancements in the field of physics and educational methodologies      Participate in professional development opportunities to enhance teaching skills      Extracurricular Activities:Participate in or organize physics-related extracurricular activities, such as science clubs or competitions      Encourage students to participate in physics-related events and projects      Classroom Management:Establish and maintain a positive and inclusive classroom environment      Implement effective classroom management strategies to ensure a conducive learning atmosphere      School Events and Committees:Contribute to school events, committees, and collaborative projects      Collaborate with colleagues on initiatives to enhance the overall educational experience

column2: Profile Summary At SPACE we are looking for a highly skilled and experienced Teacher Trainer having expertise in designing, developing, and delivering training programs to enhance the professional development of teachers. The aim of the position is to assess training needs, develop effective training modules, and provide valuable feedback and to provide ongoing support and guidance to educators.  The candidate shall possess a strong background in teaching, leadership development, and other teacher development trainings to ensure that training initiatives align with organizational goals and educational standards. Key Roles and Responsibilities Observing lessons and identifying educators strengths and weaknesses. Providing feedback, advice, and individual training sessions for educators. Supervising classroom activities, taking notes, and writing up reports to share with respective departments and relevant stakeholders. Setting weekly, monthly, quarterly and yearly goals for educators, and providing advice and guidance to ensure these goals are met. Returning to classrooms to reassess progress once educators have completed their training. Documenting and storing all trainings. Conducting special workshops, training sessions, and events on site to support customer relations department. Collaborating with teachers and other staff to develop improved curricula, lesson plans, assessments, and classroom management techniques.  Developing new strategies and plans for an improved learning experience. Keeping abreast of developments in teaching as well as your relevant subject area Knowledge Education - Bachelors and Masters in Science/Mathematics Preferably B.Ed. /M.Ed. or TTT with experience to train adult learners. Experience - Minimum 3 + years experience as a Teacher Trainer and 3 years in teaching Skills Strong communication (written and verbal both) and collaboration skills. Show excellent teaching skills and knowledge of learning development theories. Should be excellent with reports and data management including MS office, Excel, Power point, Online class conduction platforms, Google documentation over drive. Attitude Detail-oriented with the ability to create and maintain organized resources  Ability to adapt to evolving industry trends and best practices  Ability to work effectively with individuals at all levels of the organization. Others   / Perks If you are passionate about driving team success through training and enablement, we invite you to join our dynamic and collaborative work environment. Fast paced and growth minded culture Opportunity to work directly under the top management Stakeholders/Collaborators Internal - To all internal departments (HR and Admin, Marketing, Education, Sales, IT, Outreach, Accounts, Estate, Operations, Management etc.)  For more information about our company please visit:  https://space-india.com/SpaceProfile.pdf
